listings.title: Our Real Estate Projects
listings.subtitle: Explore our exclusive collection of premium real estate developments and projects.

propertyDetail.generalInfoText1: This beautifully designed project offers a fantastic opportunity for a serene and spacious living environment in the desirable Al Hulool Al Muthla community.
propertyDetail.generalInfoText2: The home features a light and bright floor plan with a large living room, dining area, and a spacious kitchen with a breakfast bar and plenty of cabinet and counter space.
propertyDetail.generalInfoText3: The master bedroom is large and comfortable, and the master bath features a large tub/shower combo.
propertyDetail.generalInfoText4: The second bedroom is also spacious and comfortable, and the second bath features a large tub/shower combo.
propertyDetail.interiorText1: This beautifully designed project offers a fantastic opportunity for a serene and spacious living environment in the desirable Al Hulool Al Muthla community.
propertyDetail.interiorText2: The home features a light and bright floor plan with a large living room, dining area, and a spacious kitchen with a breakfast bar and plenty of cabinet and counter space.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our listings, services, our just want to talk about your dream home, our team is here to help.
contact.name: Name

about.description:
We are Al Hulool Al Muthla, a leading Iraqi engineering firm specializing in architectural and structural design and execution, working according to the highest engineering standards to provide integrated solutions that combine beauty, strength, and precision in execution.

Our expertise covers the design and execution of residential, educational, and commercial projects from concept to delivery, with full commitment to timelines and quality of work.

Our vision is to be the premier destination for integrated construction in Iraq, and our mission is to deliver projects that translate trust into tangible achievements.
about.descriptionEn:
AL HULOOL AL MUTHLA IS A LEADING IRAQI ENGINEERING FIRM SPECIALIZING IN ARCHITECTURAL AND STRUCTURAL DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION.

WE PROVIDE INTEGRATED SOLUTIONS THAT COMBINE AESTHETIC VISION, STRUCTURAL STRENGTH, AND PRECISE EXECUTION.

OUR EXPERTISE COVERS RESIDENTIAL, EDUCATIONAL, AND COMMERCIAL PROJECTS - FROM CONCEPT TO DELIVERY - WITH FULL COMMITMENT TO TIMELINES AND QUALITY STANDARDS.

OUR VISION IS TO BE IRAQ'S PREMIER DESTINATION FOR INTEGRATED CONSTRUCTION, AND OUR MISSION IS TO TRANSFORM TRUST INTO TANGIBLE ACHIEVEMENTS.

services.title: OUR SPECIALIZED SERVICES
services.service1: Design, implementation, and equipping of various buildings, residential complexes, hospitals, schools, hotels, refrigerated warehouses, and specialized research centers.
services.service2: Electrical projects including power generation station services, maintenance, high and low voltage networks, power transmission lines, and electrical control units of various sizes.
services.service3: Equipping and installing transformer stations of various sizes up to 63 MVA, and all mechanical, electrical, and electronic works.
services.service4: Equipping spare parts for diesel, thermal, and gas power generation stations.
services.service5: Equipping, installing, and extending high voltage feeders and high capacity cables.
services.service6: Equipping and installing regular lighting poles that operate on solar energy.
services.service7: Construction and design of small, medium, and large drinking water stations.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.description: To become Iraq's leading engineering firm in integrated construction – from design to execution and to shape the country's urban landscape through projects that blend modernity, durability, and beauty.
vision.descriptionEn: TO BECOME IRAQ'S LEADING ENGINEERING FIRM IN INTEGRATED CONSTRUCTION – FROM DESIGN TO EXECUTION AND TO SHAPE THE COUNTRY'S URBAN LANDSCAPE THROUGH PROJECTS THAT BLEND MODERNITY, DURABILITY, AND BEAUTY.

commitment.title: COMMITMENT
commitment.description: We honor deadlines and deliver quality at every stage.
commitment.descriptionEn: WE HONOR DEADLINES AND DELIVER QUALITY AT EVERY STAGE.

professionalism.title: PROFESSIONALISM
professionalism.description: We operate by the highest engineering and ethical standards.
professionalism.descriptionEn: WE OPERATE BY THE HIGHEST ENGINEERING AND ETHICAL STANDARDS.

innovation.title: INNOVATION
innovation.description: We seek the optimal solution for every design and construction challenge.
innovation.descriptionEn: WE SEEK THE OPTIMAL SOLUTION FOR EVERY DESIGN AND CONSTRUCTION CHALLENGE.

transparency.title: TRANSPARENCY
transparency.description: Trust begins with clarity in every action.
transparency.descriptionEn: TRUST BEGINS WITH CLARITY IN EVERY ACTION.

quality.title: QUALITY
quality.description: Excellence in execution defines who we are.
quality.descriptionEn: EXCELLENCE IN EXECUTION DEFINES WHO WE ARE.

mission.label: ABOUT US
mission.subtitle: We are passionate about helping our clients achieve their real estate dreams. With a team of dedicated professionals and a commitment to integrity, we provide exceptional service and expertise in every transaction.
mission.title: Our mission is to provide unparallaled real estate services that exceed our clients expectations.
